title: Peruvian beef and noodle soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '900g beef stewing steak, cubed', '325g diced white onion', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 bay leaves', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1.9L beef stock', '225g spaghetti or vermicelli, broken into 2 to 3cm lengths', '325g chopped carrot', '225g courgette, halved lengthways and cut in 3mm slices']
